ygData.subject: RE: Diamond dust
ygData.msgSnippet: Well do you think it is a Rare Drop off one of the New Gnolls out side Paw? or may one of the Old Gnolls that Roam. Since he did OOC in that Zone. I could but
ygData.messageBody:
Well do you think it is a Rare Drop off one of the New Gnolls out side Paw?
or may one of the Old Gnolls that Roam. Since he did OOC in that Zone. I
could but wrong but just a Guess

Battlestaff Fuzzietoe, Mithaniel Marr
40th Ranked Druid of Karana
Master Brewer, Master Baker, Master Potter, Master Fletcher

-----Original Message-----
From: GoodSmritn@... [mailto:GoodSmritn@...]
Sent: Sunday, January 09, 2000 1:18 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Diamond dust


From: GoodSmritn@...

Today I heard the words "What is diamond dust used for?" and I just
couldn't
believe my ears when i was outside PAW......a 25th high elf enchanter was
asking this in "Out of Character" while on the Fennin Ro Server in the Zone
of South Karanna..........I thought he may have been pullling my leg ,but I
dont think so..... i tried really hard to get the info first before telling
him, but once he sold the dust and found out what it was used for from
someone else he clamed up and wouldnt say where ....He got me soo
pissed!!.....Im at work now so i dont have the name handy of this whacked
guy
that found the dust ,but I will post it when i get home by 8 am tomorrow
eastern standard time .Need to constantly bug this guy if were gong to get
any clue on this Location......This really happened people, this is no
bull...There is a Good possibility the Diamond Dust lies within the zone of
South Karana....If i find the source i will post it......Sincerely
Cloverleaf
Lukyfeet "Supporter of Universal knowledge" <33rd Gnome enchanter
extrordinaire>
